title: Red
content:
Red may refer to:

  • Red armour
  • Orikalkum, a dark red metal.
  • Zamorak, a god associated with the colour red.

NPCs[edit | edit source]

  • Red, the recoloured Thieving Pet.
  • Mr. Mordaut, a red dragon.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Dragons:
    • Baby red dragon
    • Baby red dragon (POH), found in a player-owned house.
    • Red dragon
    • Brutal red dragon
  • Hunter creatures:
    • Carnivorous chinchompa, caught to obtain red chinchompas.
    • Red salamander
  • Deadly red spider

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Barkers' Haberdashery items:
    • Red hat
    • Red robe top
    • Red robe bottoms
    • Red boots
    • Red gloves
  • Castle Wars rewards:
    • Red decorative helm
    • Red decorative body
    • Red decorative legs
    • Red decorative skirt
    • Red decorative sword
    • Red decorative shield
  • Holiday items:
    • Deflated red bouncy ball
    • Red bouncy ball
    • Red halloween mask
    • Red marionette
    • Red paper hat
    • Red partyhat
    • Red rainbow strand
  • Menaphite clothing:
    • Menaphite red hat
    • Menaphite red top
    • Menaphite red robe
    • Menaphite red kilt
  • Red dragonhide items:
    • Red dragonhide
    • Red dragon leather
    • Red d'hide body, and its trimmed and gold-trimmed versions.
    • Red d'hide chaps, and its trimmed and gold-trimmed versions.
    • Red d'hide vambraces
    • Red spiky vambraces
    • Red d'hide shield
  • Shades of Mort'ton keys:
    • Bronze key red
    • Steel key red
    • Black key red
    • Silver key red
  • The Eyes of Glouphrie items:
    • Red circle
    • Red pentagon
    • Red square
    • Red triangle
  • The Fremennik Trials items:
    • Old red disk
    • Red disk
    • Red herring
    • Sticky red goop
  • Treasure Trail items:
    • Bob's red shirt
    • Red beret
    • Red boater
    • Red cavalier
    • Red dragon mask
    • Red elegant blouse
    • Red elegant legs
    • Red elegant shirt
    • Red elegant skirt
    • Red firelighter
    • Red headband
  • Trouble Brewing items:
    • Bowl of red water
    • Red flowers
    • Red monkey
    • Rewards:
      • Red tricorn hat
      • Red naval shirt
      • Red navy slacks
  • Blamish red shell
  • Fremennik red cloak
  • Fremennik red shirt
  • Redberries
  • Redberry pie
  • Redwood logs
  • Redwood pyre logs
  • Redwood shield
  • Red banana, and its sliced version.
  • Red bead, an item used in the Imp Catcher quest.
  • Red cape
  • Red chinchompa
  • Red cog, an item used in the Clock Tower quest.
  • Red hot sauce, an item used in the My Arm's Big Adventure and The Feud quests.
  • Red dye
  • Red dye bellows, an item used in the Mourning's End Part I quest.
  • Red egg, an item used in the Barbarian Assault minigame.
  • Red feather
  • Red flowers
  • Red logs
  • Red mahogany log, an item used in the One Small Favour quest.
  • Red rose seed, an item used in the Garden of Tranquillity quest.
  • Red salamander
  • Red satchel
  • Red slayer helmet, and its imbued version.
  • Red spice
  • Red spiders' eggs
  • Red toad, an item used in the Mourning's End Part I quest.
  • Red topaz, and its uncut version.
  • Red topaz machete
  • Red vine worm, an item used in the Fishing Contest quest.

Other[edit | edit source]

  • The Red Axe, a dwarven mining company in Keldagrim and its associates:
    • Colonel Grimsson, a Red Axe henchman.
    • Red Axe Cat
    • Red Axe Director
    • Red Axe Secretary
  • Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz), a spell.
  • Lava Dragon Isle, a location formerly known as Red Dragon Isle.
  • Redemption, a prayer.
  • Redwood fence
  • Redwood tree
  • Red chinchompa hunting ground, a location.
  • Rise of the Red Axe, a quest series.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
